metadata.title: CVE-2024-27073 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:ttpci: fix two memleaks in budget_av_attach When saa7146_register_deviceand saa7146_vv_init fails, budget_av_attach should free the resources itallocates, like the error-handling of ttpci_budget_init does. Besides,there are two fixme comment refers to such deallocations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-azure-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
